name: List organization invitation teams

previews.name: dazzler
previews.description:
**Note:** You can now use the API to invite users to a GitHub organization. This feature is currently available for developers to preview. See the [blog post](https://developer.github.com/changes/2018-01-25-organization-invitation-api-preview) for full details. To access this feature, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

```
application/vnd.github.dazzler-preview+json

```

params.name: page
params.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

description: List all teams associated with an invitation. In order to see invitations in an organization, the authenticated user must be an organization owner.
